message.raw:
Rename drc_robot script to run_gazebo and add run_gzserver script.  Add args to .launch files to allow the caller to decide where to bring up gazebo with GUI client or not (e.g., roslaunch drc_robot_utils drc_robot.launch gzname:=gzerver).

Add rudimentary tests that verify the approximate publication rates of a few things.  The tests use the above change to run Gazebo headless, which ought to work under Jenkins on a machine without X.
